basics.name: Michael Nelson, PhD
basics.summary: Currently employed at cotality. Full stack software engineer, researcher, and entrepreneur.

publications.name: On compressing massive streaming graphs with Quadtrees
publications.publisher: 2015 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)
publications.summary: This paper discusses compressing massive streaming graphs using Quadtrees.

publications.name: Exploiting topological structures for graph compression based on quadtrees
publications.publisher: 2016 Second International Conference on Research in Computational Intelligence and Communication Networks (ICRCICN)
publications.summary: This paper explores graph compression techniques leveraging topological structures and Quadtrees.

publications.name: Queryable compression on streaming social networks
publications.publisher: 2017 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)
publications.summary: This paper introduces queryable compression techniques for streaming social networks.

publications.name: Queryable Compression on Time-Evolving Social Networks with Streaming
publications.publisher: 2018 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)
publications.summary: This paper presents queryable compression methods for time-evolving social networks with streaming.

publications.name: Algorithms on Compressed Time-Evolving Graphs
publications.publisher: 2019 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)
publications.summary: This paper explores algorithms for compressed time-evolving graphs.

publications.name: Billion-Scale Matrix Compression and Multiplication with Implications in Data Mining
publications.publisher: 2018 IEEE International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration (IRI)
publications.summary: This paper discusses billion-scale matrix compression and its applications in data mining.

publications.name: On Compressing Time-Evolving Networks
publications.publisher: ALLDATA 2021, The Seventh International Conference on Big Data, Small Data, Linked Data and Open Data
publications.summary: This paper investigates compression techniques for time-evolving networks.

publications.name: Queryable Compression on Time-evolving Web and Social Networks with Streaming
publications.publisher: ACM Transactions on the Web (ACM Trans. Web)
publications.summary: This paper proposes a compressed data structure for time-evolving web and social networks, enabling efficient queries and streaming operations.

projects.name: Discord AI Bot
projects.description: Currently collaborating on a discord AI bot with some rich features only possible with the latest AI tools.
